title: GTA+
headline: GTA+
subtitle: Join GTA+ for Benefits
content:
Join Grand Theft Auto Online's premium Membership program, delivering exclusive benefits and rewards to GTA+ Members each month, including GTA$500,000 and more. The following are included through January 8:

— The new Bravado Banshee GTS (Sports)
— 40% off the new Master Control Terminal Terrorbyte Upgrade
— The Los Santos Tattoo Jeans and Los Santos Tattoo Tee
— Exclusive holiday apparel
— And more

GTA+ automatically renews monthly, cancel anytime. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
